answers.answer: Bumps can be many things often not a STD, but only a Dr is going to be able to tell you what it is.

question: im 23 years old i have type 2 diabetes i am a large male weighting at 245 im what u say over weight my question is i have a small bump at the tip of my penis as well as a small bump on the lips of my penis it doesnt hurt nor is there any discomfort nor does it hurt when i urinate or have sexual activaties but it did hurt a little when i pinch at it but that last for about one minute. i dont have a discharge but i did have a funny little smell i have been with my partner for 4 years so we dont use protection. but recently i have use protection and after the use of the condom thats when i notice the bumps could i have an std or am i allergic to condoms i have been test for stds in the past and all came back negitive please help me im worried
title: please help me
